en-US.summary: Find and subscribe to fund info for any T. Rowe Price Fund
en-US.name: TRP_Ask_Me_Funds
en-US.description:
Find fund info for TRP Mutual Funds.

T. Rowe Price Fund lookup can find and subscribe to the fund you want easily.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch T. Rowe Price" or "Alexa, open T. Rowe Price" to start your search".

At any time, you can stop the search by saying "Alexa, stop"
